text:

text: *** Bug 52925 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 28478
2012-03-16_tc6_52805_ecj372.patch

In 7.0.x it was fixed by r1300573

I am attaching patch for 6.0.x.

A caveat is that the patch updates res/maven/jasper.pom, but I do not see "org.eclipse.jdt.core.compiler" version 3.7.2 being available from Maven Central now [1].

[1] http://search.maven.org/#search|ga|1|g%3A%22org.eclipse.jdt.core.compiler%22

Patch was proposed for 6.0.x.

Moving the issue to Tomcat 6, because it is already fixed in 7.0.x.
